location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 3852/1912 Pt 2 'Persia. Conditions in South Persia. German Documents'

mods.abstract: The second part of the volume (folios 185 to 324) concerns conditions of trade in South Persia and German documents relating to this. Copies of two books are present in the volume: ' La Perse et la Guerre Européenne par un Patriote Persan, Édition de la Librairie Nouvelle de Lausanne, 1917'and ' Behind the Veil in Persia: English Documents, C.L. van Langenhuysen, Amsterdam 1917'.Other visual items of interest in Part 2 include a 'Map of Persia' (folio 299) depicting the Russian and British zones of influence along with project railways, frontier lines and provincial boundaries.
